interpretation:
The "index pointing at the viewer" card is all about attention, direction, and guidance. When this card appears in a reading, it is a sign that you need to pay close attention to what is happening around you. It suggests that you may be missing important details or opportunities that are right in front of you. 

This card also indicates that you need to be open to guidance and direction from others. You may be feeling lost or unsure about your path, and this card suggests that you should seek out the advice of someone you trust. Alternatively, it may be a sign that you have valuable knowledge or expertise to share with others, and that you should be more assertive in offering your guidance.

Overall, the "index pointing at the viewer" card is an invitation to pay attention, seek guidance, and take action. It suggests that you have the power to change your direction and create the life you want, as long as you stay alert and open to the opportunities that come your way.
